applications.name: Google Drive
applications.description: Google Drive is a cloud storage and file management service for storing, sharing, and organizing files. It includes keyboard navigation for efficient file management and accessibility support for screen readers.

shortcuts.description: Press G then N to move focus to the left navigation panel with folders and shortcuts.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce navigation panel focused. Use arrow keys to navigate folders.

shortcuts.description: Press G then L to move focus to the main files list view.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce files list focused. Navigate files with arrow keys.

shortcuts.description: Press G then T to move focus to the top toolbar with search and view options.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce toolbar focused.

shortcuts.description: Press arrow keys to navigate through files and folders in list or grid view.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce each file name, type, and modified date as you navigate.

shortcuts.context: When file or folder is selected
shortcuts.description: Press Enter to open selected file or folder.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce file opening. Folders open in current view, files open in appropriate editor.

shortcuts.description: Press Alt and Left Arrow to go back to previous folder in navigation history.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce previous folder name.

shortcuts.description: Press Control and Forward Slash together to show list of all keyboard shortcuts.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce shortcuts help dialog opened.

shortcuts.description: Press Shift and F together to create a new folder in current location.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce new folder dialog. Type folder name and press Enter.

shortcuts.description: Press Control and O together to open file picker for uploading files to Drive.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce file picker dialog. Select files to upload.

shortcuts.description: Press Control, Shift, and O together to upload an entire folder with its contents.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce folder picker. Select folder to upload with all files.

shortcuts.context: When file or folder is selected
shortcuts.description: Press N to rename the selected file or folder.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce rename dialog. Type new name and press Enter.

shortcuts.context: When file or folder is selected
shortcuts.description: Press Z to move selected items to a different folder.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce move dialog. Navigate folders and press Enter to move.

shortcuts.context: When file or folder is selected
shortcuts.description: Press S to star or unstar the selected item for quick access.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce item starred or unstarred. Starred items appear in Starred folder.

shortcuts.context: When file or folder is selected
shortcuts.description: Press Period to open sharing settings for selected file or folder.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce share dialog. Add people and set permissions.

shortcuts.context: When file or folder is selected
shortcuts.description: Press Hash key to move selected items to trash.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce item moved to trash. Can be restored from Trash folder.

shortcuts.context: When item in trash is selected
shortcuts.description: Press Z while in Trash to restore selected items to original location.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce item restored. Returns to original folder.

shortcuts.description: Press Shift and Period together to get shareable link for selected file.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce link dialog. Copy link to share with others.

shortcuts.context: When file or folder is focused
shortcuts.description: Press X to select or deselect the focused item without moving focus.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce item selected or deselected. Allows building multi-selection.

shortcuts.description: Press Control and A together to select all visible files in current view.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce all items selected with count.

shortcuts.description: Press Control, Shift, and A together to clear all selections.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce selection cleared.

shortcuts.description: Press D to show or hide the details pane with file information and activity.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce details pane shown or hidden.

shortcuts.description: Press V to toggle between list view and grid view for files.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce view changed to list or grid.

shortcuts.description: Press Forward Slash to place focus in search box for searching files and folders.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce search box focused. Type keywords to search.

shortcuts.description: Press Control and Forward Slash to show advanced search options for filtering results.
shortcuts.notes: Screen readers announce search options panel. Filter by type, owner, date, etc.
